October 3, 2012, Kathleen worked with Joe in different groups

Joe was one of the most competent (and personable) programmers I have ever worked with. His ability to keep an even keel in the midst of complex projects and launches was contagious and helped keep the team moving forward. His legacy here in forging new solutions (most notably conversion to a Drupal CMS and a .php calendar program) has and will be relied upon for years to come. And, he is just plain smart. I loved watching his wheels turn with each new challenge, which he always addressed quickly and thoroughly. If I could build a dream team, Joe would be on it.
